gears.sidescroller.world.items

Class GearItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • gears.sidescroller.world.core.ObjectInWorld
      • gears.sidescroller.world.items.AbstractItem
        • gears.sidescroller.world.items.GearItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collidable

    public class GearItem
extends AbstractItem
    The GearItem is an item which the Player can pick up, then place in their Area as a PlacedGearMachine.
